page.title: 10HOUSES IN GREAT SAMPFORD
page.content: Most of the houses in The Sampfords are detatched.A lot of the houses in this area are cottages or farm houses.Brick is probably the most common material used for building houses in The Sampfords.All the houses have electricity and water.Twenty six new houses are being built in Gt. Sampford,six of which will be council houses.All the rest will be private houses.The houses in this area will probably become slightly more valuable because of the expansion of Stansted Airport.People will want to live near the airport.There are several bungalows reserved for the elderly.Some of the houses in the area are over 500 years old.There are about 200 houses in the district.
